## Custom Instructions for Github Copilot

### Project Info

- This is a Chrome extension for making navigating Salesforce setup menu easier.
- It iterates over the setup menu and grabs all the hyperlinks, arranges them in alphabetical order and lets users pin items.
- It also iterates over all available objects in object manager, arranges them in alphabetical order and lets users pin items.
- There will be two tabs, one for setup menu and one for object manager.
- There will be a search bar to search for items in both tabs.
- There will also be a handy input box above the search bar to navigate to any record using record id.

### Coding Instructions

- Use descriptive variable names.
- Follow standards and best practices for writing clean and maintainable code.
- Keep code modular, suggest splitting into multiple files if necessary.
- Keep new code consistent with existing code in terms of naming and design patterns.
